```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: false

import matplotlib
matplotlib.use("svg")
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

np.random.seed(42)
x = np.linspace(0, 10, 50)
y = 2.5 * x + np.random.normal(0, 3, 50)

fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(12, 8))
ax.scatter(x, y, s=100, alpha=0.7, c="#555555", edgecolors="none")
ax.plot(x, 2.5 * x, color="#1a1a1a", linewidth=2.5)
ax.set_xlabel("X variable", fontsize=16, labelpad=10)
ax.set_ylabel("Y variable", fontsize=16, labelpad=10)
ax.tick_params(labelsize=14)
ax.spines["top"].set_visible(False)
ax.spines["right"].set_visible(False)
ax.spines["left"].set_color("#cccccc")
ax.spines["bottom"].set_color("#cccccc")
ax.tick_params(colors="#999999")
plt.tight_layout()
fig.savefig("figures/results.svg", bbox_inches="tight", transparent=True)
plt.close()
```
